text: Winter Solstice is an American metalcore band formed in 2000. The group split up in 2006. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 2005 The Fall of Rome * Release date: March 8, 2005 * Label: Metal Blade Records ===Music videos=== Year Title Director 2005 "Following Caligula" Jonathan Covert ==References== Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:2006 disestablishments in the United States Category:2000s American music groups Category:Christian metal bands Category:Metalcore bands Category:Musical groups established in 2000 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2006 Category:Musical groups from Virginia
title: Winter Solstice (band)
